Uses of Class
model.InformationContainer

  • Packages that use InformationContainer 
    Package Description
    control
    Provides the controlling body of the software: The whole program logic is contained in this package.
    control.util
    Provides static functions to encrypt, generate needed random numbers or recalculate values.
    model
    Provides the handling with file specific information and their storing.
    model.cc
    Provides the interfaces to cloud storages.
